column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Ashley was there on the day of and always made a point to check in with me at every part of the day. She even brought me sangria refills too! So thoughtful. We actually dropped off our items the Friday before the wedding and they took care of everything
column2: put programs at every place setting and literally (with the help of our friends/coordinators) gave us the day we dreamed of
